Name: NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Souzou
About the game: The latest title in the historical simulation series of 'Nobunaga's Ambition' has arrived. Become a daimy≈ç of the Warring States era, and unite the land! With 'the creation of a new age' as the key concept, the player has the opportunity to do what Nobunaga himself could not: unite the land, and build a new world. This title features beautifully recreated castle towns, dynamic battlefield action and dramatic events. As befits the 30th anniversary of the series, this is the most realistic recreation of the period yet! Note: This game is only available in Traditional Chinese.
